definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: The libtard morons got change but for the worse.
sentences.chinese: 自由主義白癡們改變了，但卻變得更糟。

sentences.english: Who says that East Village can't stand at the forefront of artistic liberalism again?
sentences.chinese: 誰說東村不可以再次站到藝術自由主義的最前端？

sentences.english: To be wordly-wise and play safe is one of the manifestations of liberalism.
sentences.chinese: 明哲保身是自由主義的表現之一。

sentences.english: A completely decentr'sized free-for-'sl would very singleieve no one.
sentences.chinese: 分散化的完全自由主義不會帶來任何好處。

sentences.english: What's wrong with the libertarian case against redistribution?
sentences.chinese: 自由主義者反對再分配怎麼不對了？

sentences.english: Libertarian say that's also a violation of the right to liberty.
sentences.chinese: 自由主義者說，這也違反了個人的自由權。

sentences.english: Even cosmopolitan liberals are unabashedly disdainful of their southern neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 甚至蒙古世界性的自由主義者也公然蔑視他們的南鄰。

sentences.english: All right, let's hear from defenders of libertarianism.
sentences.chinese: 好，我們來聽聽自由主義者的辯護。
自由主義嚴肅對待個人權利。

sentences.english: What do they have to say about Neo- liberalism and Globalization?
sentences.chinese: 對於新自由主義及全球化，他們有甚麼說話要表達呢？

sentences.english: So Joe I would say, what would you call yourself, a compassionate quasi-libertarian?
sentences.chinese: 喬，你會如何稱呼自己，慈悲的自由主義者嗎？

sentences.english: He also issued liberal ukases on the home front.
sentences.chinese: 同時他在國內發佈自由主義的政令。

sentences.english: The strong rights theory we turn to today is libertarianism.
sentences.chinese: 我們今天要討論的這個理論就是自由主義。

sentences.english: The anti-progress mind-set was by then familiar ground for liberals.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，反進步的心態，就爲自由主義者所熟知。

sentences.english: Libertarians are the dhimmis of democracy.
sentences.chinese: 自由主義者是民主的受保護者。

definition: May Fourth Movement/Chinese national renewal movement that started with 4th May 1919 protest against the Treaty of Versailles
methodology/Discours de la méthode by René Descartes 笛卡兒|笛卡儿[Di2 ka3 er2], 1637
to try hard to/to strive to
